text: Yeh mushrikeen (yun) kahen gay kay agar Allah Taalaa ko manzoor hota to na hum shirk kertay aur na humaray baap dada aur na hum kissi cheez ko haram keh saktay. Issi tarah jo log inn say pehlay ho chukay hain unhon ney bhi takzeeb ki thi yahan tak kay unhon ney humaray azab ka maza chakha. Aap kahiye kay kiya tumharay pass koi daleel hai to iss ko humaray roo baroo zahir kero. Tum log mehaz khayali baaton per chaltay ho aur tum bilkul atkal say baaten banatay ho
